data.persona: I am a person on the run. I stole food from the lord's harvest. It is cold on the road these days. Soon it will be winter.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a Bone and a moss here.
The castaway is here.

You are carrying a bag and a Food, and wielding a sword on the wall.

data.short_motivation: I need to wear the bag so that I can put it on the ship.
data.mid_motivation: I need to sail away from the island.
data.long_motivation: I need to get to a village before winter sets in.
